LanguageData.Mousekin_CultureKingdom.label: Traditional Mousekinian
LanguageData.Mousekin_CultureKingdom.description: A feudal agrarian culture resembling Regency-era England, characterized by institutionalised patriarchy, rigid social strata and a deep reverence for flowers.
LanguageData.Mousekin_CultureIndyTown.label: Enlightened Mousekinian
LanguageData.Mousekin_CultureIndyTown.description: A hardy agrarian culture that embraces egalitarian and democratic ideals.
LanguageData.Mousekin_CultureNomad.label: Rodemanian
LanguageData.Mousekin_CultureNomad.description: A nomadic culture that celebrates wanderlust, generosity and hospitality.
LanguageData.Mousekin_CultureBrigand.label: Outpawian
LanguageData.Mousekin_CultureBrigand.description: A pragmatic, Social Darwinist culture common amongst rodent gangs that values personal strength, winning at all costs and having the biggest nut stash.
